snippet: A free Web site matches people looking for a place to work for the day with businesses that have available desks to offer.
abstract: App City column on Loosecubes, a free mobile Web site that matches people looking for a place to work for the day with businesses that have desk space to offer; company is planning a full iPhone app.
lead_paragraph: A free Web site matches people looking for a place to work for the day with businesses that have available desks to offer.

headline.print_headline: Office Space for the Wandering Worker
headline.seo: Office Space for the Wandering Worker
headline.main: Office Space for the Wandering Worker
